original_title: Jimmy Buffett: Welcome to Fin City Live in Las Vegas 2011
overview: Margaritaville-Las Vegas breaks the Guiness Book of World Record for the largest Margarita The Margaritaville Casino opened in the Flamingo Hotel, next to the Restaurant and Store And, Jimmy performed 2 incredible Saturday night shows at the MGM, which have been captured in Audio, Video, and Blu-ray. This is the best of both shows.
title: Jimmy Buffett: Welcome to Fin City Live in Las Vegas 2011
